Sentencas: Co-based perovskite cathodes have demonstrated impressive catalytic activity for oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: However, these cathodes face the challenges such as high cost and thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) mismatch.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: On the other hand, Fe-based perovskite oxides like LaFeO3 exhibit more stable properties and lower TEC, but their ORR activity is not as remarkable as that of Co-based cathodes.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: In this study, La3+ at the A-site of LaFeO3 was substituted by aliovalent alkaline-earth metal cations.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: The research findings reveal that the doping of alkaline-earth metal ions induces the formation of structural defects and alters the valence state of Fe.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: This leads to an increase in the conductivity and oxygen vacancy concentration, which are critical for ORR kinetics in both H-SOFC and O-SOFC.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: Among the various dopants, Sr doped LaFeO3 (LSrF) exhibits the most outstanding ORR catalytic activity.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: This can be attributed to its highest total conductivity, O2conductivity, oxygen surface exchange coefficient, and oxygen bulk diffusion coefficient.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: At 700 degrees C, single cell with LSrF cathode achieves peak power densities of 0.781 and 0.894 W cm-2, for O2--conducting solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and H+-conducting SOFC, respectively.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: These performances are essentially twice that of single cell with LaFeO3 cathode.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements

Sentencas: The findings of this study provide valuable insights into doping strategies for Fe-based perovskite cathodes and contribute to the advancement of IT-SOFC cathode research.
Titulo: Tuning the ORR catalytic activity of LaFeO3-δ-based perovskite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells by doping with alkaline-earth metal elements
